basics.name: Seth Michael Stalley
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Hi there! I'm a software engineer and U.S. expatriate who lives in Costa Rica.

work.summary: Working as a full stack software engineer at a fast paced machine learning startup.
highlights: Leader in company's transition to an automated CI/CD processes. Products are now built and deployed in minutes instead of days.
Integral designer and developer of full stack A/B Testing project. The product uses proprietary Machine Learning models to explain the 'Why' behind customer's preferences.

work.summary: Created internal Java microservice that allows internal applications to easily communicate with Amazon's email service.
highlights: Greatly simplified the existing solution that was being used to send emails from internal IT applications.
Leveraged AWS SNS and SQS to create a highly portable and scalable service.
Created internal documentation and metrics dashboards.
Setup near real-time logs and alarms using AWS CloudWatch.
After the internship, I was greenlit by the bar raiser and team to be hired as a full time SDE at Amazon.

volunteer.summary: Assisted with the development of a cross-platform Java Swing application with the goal of processing data from a spectrophotometer.
highlights: Implemented encrypted file Save/Open feature for Java desktop application.
Created a REST API using Node.js to securely expose MySQL procedures over HTTPS.
Created complementary web app using polymer, which displays real time data from REST API and graphs data using highcharts.
